messages.title: My promises to you
messages.content:
Fighting for Real Jobs
Regenerating Coventry City Centre
Make your neighborhood safe
A Better NHS for Everyone

This election is a choice between Labour, that is fighting for hard working people, and the Tories who would risk the recovery and want to protect the privileged few. I need your support to carry on doing my best for you.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A derelict site transformed which now provides a concert and sports stadium, shopping and hundreds of jobs in the North East of the City. It took a long time but is now making a real contribution to the economy and quality of life for our part of the City.
We must never forget the dreadful facilities our new Hospital replaced, nor the struggle it was to get it built. I'm proud of what I achieved and my role in getting our Hospital built.

I take up thousands of cases for constituents every year, from minor injustices to major issues. I always try my hardest to solve cases for my help and I stand up for what people in Coventry North East want.

issues.health: We must never forget the dreadful facilities our new Hospital replaced, nor the struggle it was to get it built. I'm proud of what I achieved and my role in getting our Hospital built.

politicalExperience.achievements: Fighting for local schools and the best deal for Coventry North East.

contactInformation.address: Transport House, Short Street, Coventry, CV1 2LS

endorsements.endorsement: Bob has been very helpful with problems since I have had him. I am delighted my son was born in the brand new hospital just down the road. I know how hard Bob worked to help get it built.

images.caption: A Strong Local Voice - Standing Up for Coventry
